title: Federal Hall National Memorial: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Federal Hall at the time of the 1929 Stock Market crash. scpr.org  Federal Hall has been a gathering place for free speech throughout our nation's history. This page will guide you to find out the latest news regarding this park site and the other National Parks of New York Harbor.          Follow us on Twitter for information about upcoming special events, programming changes, fun facts, and more.         For updates about other sites within the National Parks of New York Harbor, visit our News Room.      News from Federal Hall: Read the latest News Releases Federal Hall Receives Restoration Grant and National Treasure Status        Need to contact Public Affairs?   Address Public Affairs Officer, National Parks of New York Harbor Federal Hall National Memorial 26 Wall Street New York, NY 10005 Phone National Parks of New York Harbor - Main Office (212) 668-5180  National Parks of New York Harbor - Public Affairs Office (212) 668-2208  Fax (212) 668-2375  Email Public Affairs Officer, National Parks of New York Harbor
